recipes.name: Chile Relleno
recipes.description: This is a mexican food. Made with poblano peppers stuffed with cheese. It's then dipped in whipped egg whites and fried. Served in a red salsa and your favorite sides or toppings!

recipes.name: Pupusas
recipes.description: This is Salvadorian food. It's made using corn flour and stuffed with your favorite fillin gs. Served with a slaw and red salsa along with any additional toppings you'd like.

recipes.name: Mango Claw
recipes.description: This is a mango Whiteclaw that was dipped in chamoy sauce and tajin for extra umph.
